mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( PRODUCT_NO , TITLE , PRICE , HIT , CONTENT , STATUS , ADDRESS , REG_NO , MOD_NO , REG_DATE , MOD_DATE , DEL_YN )VALUES( PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#{title} ,${price} ,0 ,#{content} ,1 ,#{address} ,#{regNo} ,#{regNo} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE ,'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT max(product_no) as product_no FROM PRODUCT WHERE REG_NO = #{regNo}

SELECT P.* FROM( SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO ,P.CONTENT, P.TITLE , P.ADDRESS , P.PRICE , P.HIT , L.LIKECOUNT FROM PRODUCT P LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PRODUCT_NO , COUNT(REG_NO) AS LIKECOUNT FROM LIKEPRODUCT GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO) L ON P.PRODUCT_NO = L.PRODUCT_NO)P WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = #{param1}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON M.MEMBER_NO = P.REG_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PRODUCT_NO AS PNO , LISTAGG(FILE_PATH , ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO)IMAGES FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO) I ON P.PRODUCT_NO = I.PNO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PRODUCT_NO , COUNT(REG_NO) AS LIKECOUNT FROM LIKEPRODUCT GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO) L ON P.PRODUCT_NO = L.PRODUCT_NO
WHERE P.STATUS = 1 AND P.DEL_YN = 'N' AND M.STATUS = 0
WHERE P.STATUS = 1 AND P.DEL_YN = 'N' AND M.STATUS = 0 AND P.ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{city} || '%'
WHERE P.STATUS = 1 AND P.DEL_YN = 'N' AND M.STATUS = 0 AND P.ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{region} || '%'
